name: Armor Piercing
description: Standard armor-piercing shell, manufactured and widely used by Claymore Armaments.

name: Armor Piercing Capped
description: An improved version of the AP shell, designed to penetrate armor more effectively. However, it is heavier and has a lower velocity than the standard AP shell.

name: High Explosive
description: Manufactured by OAO "Chelvogradmet", it's a shell made to explode on impact, causing damage to the target and surrounding area. It doesn't penetrate armor but can cause significant damage by the explosion.

name: High Explosive Anti-Tank Fin Stabilized
description: A specialized shell designed to penetrate a specified amount of armor at any range. It has a smaller explosion radius than the standard HE shell, but it is more effective against armored targets and faster thanks to the fins.

name: Armor Piercing Composite Rigid
description: A shell with a hard core made of tungsten made to penetrate thick armor. It has a higher velocity than the standard AP shell.

name: Armor Piercing Discarding Sabot
description: An upgrade of the APCR shell, it has a higher velocity and is more effective against armor.

name: Armor Piercing Fin Stabilized Discarding Sabot
description: The ultimate anti-tank shell, it has a very high velocity and is very effective against armor. A long and very precise rod penetrator made of depleted uranium.
